p: We used two different approaches to compare the results of the microsimulation models with expectations. First, we compared the age- and sex-specific percentages of transitions from salmonellosis to health or to a sequelae condition obtained from the simulation with expectations based on the literature. Second, we compared the simulated population structure for 2036 with age- and sex-specific population projections for Central Queensland in 2036 from the QGSO ( 2014).
